column1: wav48/p247/p247_012.wav|Throughout the centuries people have explained the rainbow in various ways. )|20
wav48/p247/p247_013.wav|Some have accepted it as a miracle without physical explanation. )|20
wav48/p247/p247_014.wav|To the Hebrews it was a token that there would be no more universal floods. )|20
wav48/p247/p247_016.wav|The Norsemen considered the rainbow as a bridge over which the gods passed from earth to their home in the sky. )|20
wav48/p247/p247_017.wav|Others have tried to explain the phenomenon physically. )|20
wav48/p247/p247_018.wav|Aristotle thought that the rainbow was caused by reflection of the sun's rays by the rain. )|20
wav48/p247/p247_019.wav|Since then physicists have found that it is not reflection
column2: but refraction by the raindrops which causes the rainbows. )|20

column1: wav48/p247/p247_020.wav|Many complicated ideas about the rainbow have been formed. )|20
wav48/p247/p247_021.wav|The difference in the rainbow depends considerably upon the size of the drops
column2: and the width of the colored band increases as the size of the drops increases. )|20

column1: wav48/p247/p247_022.wav|The actual primary rainbow observed is said to be the effect of super-imposition of a number of bows. )|20
wav48/p247/p247_023.wav|If the red of the second bow falls upon the green of the first
column2: the result is to give a bow with an abnormally wide yellow band
column3: since red and green light when mixed form yellow. )|20

column1: wav48/p265/p265_012.wav|Throughout the centuries people have explained the rainbow in various ways. |38

wav48/p265/p265_014.wav|To the Hebrews it was a token that there would be no more universal floods. |38

wav48/p265/p265_017.wav|Others have tried to explain the phenomenon physically. |38
wav48/p265/p265_018.wav|Aristotle thought that the rainbow was caused by reflection of the sun's rays by the rain. |38

column1: wav48/p287/p287_012.wav|Throughout the centuries people have explained the rainbow in various ways. |60

wav48/p287/p287_014.wav|To the Hebrews it was a token that there would be no more universal floods. |60
wav48/p287/p287_015.wav|The Greeks used to imagine that it was a sign from the gods to foretell war or heavy rain. |60
wav48/p287/p287_016.wav|The Norsemen considered the rainbow as a bridge over which the gods passed from earth to their home in the sky. |60
wav48/p287/p287_017.wav|Others have tried to explain the phenomenon physically. |60
wav48/p287/p287_018.wav|Aristotle thought that the rainbow was caused by reflection of the sun's rays by the rain. |60

column1: wav48/p340/p340_012.wav|Throughout the centuries people have explained the rainbow in various ways.|96

wav48/p340/p340_017.wav|Others have tried to explain this phenomenon physically.|96

column1: wav48/p360/p360_012.wav|Throughout the centuries people have explained the rainbow in various ways.|102

column1: wav48/p364/p364_012.wav|Throughout the centuries people have explained the rainbow in various ways.|106

column1: wav48/p376/p376_012.wav|""""""Throughout the centuries people have explained the rainbow in various ways. """"""|108"
wav48/p376/p376_013.wav|""""""Some have accepted it as a miracle without physical explanation. """"""|108"
wav48/p376/p376_014.wav|""""""To the Hebrews it was a token that there would be no more universal floods. """"""|108"
wav48/p376/p376_015.wav|""""""The Greeks used to imagine that it was a sign from the gods to foretell war or heavy rain. """"""|108"
wav48/p376/p376_016.wav|""""""The Norsemen considered the rainbow as a bridge over which the gods passed from earth to their home in the sky. """"""|108"
wav48/p376/p376_017.wav|""""""Others have tried to explain the phenomenon physically. """"""|108"
wav48/p376/p376_018.wav|""""""Aristotle thought that the rainbow was caused by reflection of the sun's rays by the rain. """"""|108"
wav48/p376/p376_019.wav|""""""Since then physicists have found that it is not reflection"
column2: but refraction by the raindrops which causes the rainbows. """|108

column1: wav48/p376/p376_020.wav|""""""Many complicated ideas about the rainbow have been formed. """"""|108"
wav48/p376/p376_021.wav|""""""The difference in the rainbow depends considerably upon the size of the drops"
column2: and the width of the colored band increases as the size of the drops increases. """|108

column1: wav48/p376/p376_022.wav|""""""The actual primary rainbow observed is said to be the effect of super-imposition of a number of bows. """"""|108"
wav48/p376/p376_023.wav|""""""If the red of the second bow falls upon the green of the first"
column2: the result is to give a bow with an abnormally wide yellow band
